item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Product Settings - Update number of product displayed on FO
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Product Settings - Update number of product displayed on FO Steps Step Description Expected result On BO > Configure > Shop Paramaters > Product Settings The page should display correctly Change Products per page Click to Save “Update successful” notification On FO The page should display correctly Click to “All products” The page should display correctly
